q_and_a.question: What's the use of server xp?
q_and_a.answer: Image permission is provided through XP roles. To post media, you must be at least a Veteran Adventurer, given at 5000 xp. XP is given at a random amount between 20-50 xp, which is earned **per minute of chatting** —- you can check your rank in <#1105759325806411796> with `t!rank`. <#972442301760684082>, <#1186653355158810684>, & <#975586078880858132> has universal media permission.

q_and_a.question: What is fatebounds?
q_and_a.answer: Use `>>fblist` to see all fatebounds and `>>fb` for specific fatebounds

q_and_a.question: How do I see the fatebounds?
q_and_a.answer: Use `>>fblist` to see all fatebounds and `>>fb` for specific fatebounds

q_and_a.question: What are embers?
q_and_a.answer: Embers are items used to fight a boss with certain buffs for certain rewards

q_and_a.question: What is cybermod?
q_and_a.answer:
Cybermod is unlocked after clearing <:BulrushMarshes:1181786654629957642> Bulrush Marshes for the first time 
Equipment can be cybermodded by paying parts and removing 1 regular/enhance modifier of your choice

q_and_a.question: What is hologram stages?
q_and_a.answer: You can challenge hologram stages after clearing <:BulrushMarshes:1181786654629957642> Bulrush Marshes for the first time The difficulty can be selected Hologram stages spawn holograms of enemies, and have a meter which slowly increases over time, the rate determining on the difficulty and your computability Once the meter reaches 100%, hologram enemies will stop spawning

q_and_a.question: What are hologram chests?
q_and_a.answer: After clearing hologram stages, there will be an extra hologram chest you can open with hologram keys The chest provides gold, parts and chips, and the reward increases based on difficulty

q_and_a.question: What are hologram keys?
q_and_a.answer: Hologram keys are required to open hologram chests There is a limit to the amount of hologram keys you hold, and they will regenerate over time if the number of keys does not exceed the limit Hologram keys can also be bought with gems, and they can exceed the limit if obtained this way

q_and_a.question: What are chips?
q_and_a.answer:
You can apply a chip you own to chip slots on cybermod equipment 
Chips are not consumed when applied
Different pieces of equipment can equip different type of chips, each having a different effect and gives different base stats
If there are repeated chips equipped, only one with the highest level will take effect
You can dismantle excess chips for parts

q_and_a.question: What are chip levels?
q_and_a.answer:
+1 computability per level
Upgrade effect per odd number level [Lv 1,3,5,7]
Double base stat per even number level [Lv 2,4,6]
```Level 1-2 - Uncommon(Green)
Level 3-4 - Rare(Blue)
Level 5-6 - Epic(Purple)Level 7 - Legendary(Yellow)```

q_and_a.question: What is chip upgrading?
q_and_a.answer: Chips can be upgraded to the next level by merging 3 of the same chip

q_and_a.question: What is a circle chip?
q_and_a.answer:
**Effects:**
Gives one of 5 abilities [equip in quick (potion) slot] 
Ability lv 1|1|2|2|3|3|4

**Possible abilities:** 
**Teleport**
	Teleport to a location
	Skill level reduces CD
**Heal**
	Heal % of HP over time
	2.5s duration
	Skill level increases effect and reduces CD
**Hologram projection**
	Make a hologram projection of an enemy with a % of hp
	Transfer a % of hologram dmg taken to the original
	Skill level increases effect
**Cooldown reduction**
	Reduce a % of other skills CD
	16s cd
	Skill level increases effect
**Aura**
	Create an aura that reduces ally damage taken and increases ally damage dealt
	Skill level increases effect
**Stats:**
	Regular:
		Def +0|15|15|30|30|60|60
	Mutated:
		Ability gains 1 of 3 prefixes which gives special effect
		(Chance different based on gear base stat type)
		Def +0|10|10|20|20|40|40

q_and_a.question: What is a triangle chip?
q_and_a.answer:
**Effects:**
Increase level of FBs on weapon
	Uncommon(Green) Chip: Listed FB level +1
	Rare(Blue) Chip: Listed FB level +1, listed FB level extra +1 if the weapon has the listed fb
	Epic(Purple) Chip: Listed FB level +2, other FB on weapon +1 if the weapon has the listed fb
	Legendary(Yellow) Chip: Listed FB level +2, other FB on weapon +2 if the weapon has the listed fb
Stats:
	Regular FB:
		Attack/Magic +0|30|30|60|60|120|120
	Boss FB:
		Attack/Magic +0|40|40|80|80|160|160

q_and_a.question: What is a square chip?
q_and_a.answer:
**Effects:**
Upgrade levels of an unlocked skill
The listed skill will change depending on your current class
Skill lv +1|1|2|2|3|3|4 (Can go over Lv4, increase ratio remains same)
Stats:
	Str/Dex/Int +0|20|20|40|40|80|80

q_and_a.question: What is a weapon chip?
q_and_a.answer:
**Effects:**
Increase level of FBs on weapon
	Uncommon(Green) Chip: Listed FB level +1
	Rare(Blue) Chip: Listed FB level +1, listed FB level extra +1 if the weapon has the listed fb
	Epic(Purple) Chip: Listed FB level +2, other FB on weapon +1 if the weapon has the listed fb
	Legendary(Yellow) Chip: Listed FB level +2, other FB on weapon +2 if the weapon has the listed fb
Stats:
	Regular FB:
		Attack/Magic +0|30|30|60|60|120|120
	Boss FB:
		Attack/Magic +0|40|40|80|80|160|160

q_and_a.question: What is a armor chip?
q_and_a.answer:
**Effects:**
Upgrade levels of an unlocked skill
The listed skill will change depending on your current class
Skill lv +1|1|2|2|3|3|4 (Can go over Lv4, increase ratio remains same)
Stats:
	Str/Dex/Int +0|20|20|40|40|80|80

q_and_a.question: How do I get chips?
q_and_a.answer:
Hologram Chest
Mechanical (Key) Chest
Dismantling Cybermod Equipment (of same chip)
Accessories:
	75% Mutated (Prefix chance based on base stat type)
	25% Regular
Armors:
	Helmet: left base class skill chip
	Chestplate: right base class skill chip
	Boots: combined class skill chip

q_and_a.question: What are apex levels?
q_and_a.answer:
Apex levels are extra levels unlocked after you reach level 50 The maximum apex level is 100 Apex levels give 1 apex point per level, which you can spend on a stat (str/dex/int) to gain 2 of the stat For every 5 apex points spent on each stat up to 25, you receive an extra stats modifier Apex nodes, unlocked at lv 5, 15 and 25 apex points on each stat, can be upgraded with helxarine to give stats modifier and helxar corruption related buffs

Apex levels are shared across characters If you have not yet reached lv50 on a seasonal character, the maximum amount of apex points active in each stat will be equal to [Level]/2, and all of your seasonal characters will regain all bonus from apex levels when any seasonal character reaches lv50

q_and_a.question: How do I get apex levels?
q_and_a.answer:
Apex levels are extra levels unlocked after you reach level 50 The maximum apex level is 100 Apex levels give 1 apex point per level, which you can spend on a stat (str/dex/int) to gain 2 of the stat For every 5 apex points spent on each stat up to 25, you receive an extra stats modifier Apex nodes, unlocked at lv 5, 15 and 25 apex points on each stat, can be upgraded with helxarine to give stats modifier and helxar corruption related buffs

Apex levels are shared across characters If you have not yet reached lv50 on a seasonal character, the maximum amount of apex points active in each stat will be equal to [Level]/2, and all of your seasonal characters will regain all bonus from apex levels when any seasonal character reaches lv50

q_and_a.question: Where to get cards?
q_and_a.answer:
Outdated, only Mystraea, and Esoteria maps from S0

q_and_a.question: How do I report bugs?
q_and_a.answer:
# Bug Report 
Staff and Moderators of this Discord Server can't help you with your in game concerns. You can post your bug report at https://discord.com/channels/971700371112198194/1169171096793251900 or email it at `info@chillyroom.games` with this format: 
1. State the name of the game if sending by email to avoid confusion 
2. Description of the bug 
3. Device model & Operating system 
Account ID/Player ID 
Add screenshot or record the bug encountered

q_and_a.question: How do I contact moderators?
q_and_a.answer: Go to <#1176532007837249567> and make a ticket!

q_and_a.question: Which is the best class?
q_and_a.answer: None, all of it depends on your build and playstyle

q_and_a.question: Which class is better?
q_and_a.answer: None, depends on you're preference

q_and_a.question: What is a Necromancer class?
q_and_a.answer: Necromancer a class that can manipulate souls and the dead

q_and_a.question: What is a Astral Mage class?
q_and_a.answer: A mage class that stacks dark ailments onto you and enemies

q_and_a.question: What is a Wildwalker class?
q_and_a.answer: A melee ailments oriented class which makes it easy to scale damage

q_and_a.question: What is a Farstrider class?
q_and_a.answer: <:hcFarstrider:1198104732649140365> Farstrider is medium range glass cannon. It inherits it's main poison damage type from <:pcHerbalist:1198104735115386982> herbalist and the ranged gameplay of <:pcArcher:975584199438389308> archer

q_and_a.question: What is a Druid class?
q_and_a.answer: Utilizes nature itself to become a bear, summon wolves and even vines!

q_and_a.question: What is a Stormshaman class?
q_and_a.answer: Ailments oriented class hence easy to scaling damage

q_and_a.question: What is a Stormwarden class?
q_and_a.answer: Combines the offense from Tempest Mage with the powerful defense from Aegis

q_and_a.question: What is a Elementalist class?
q_and_a.answer: Elementalist is a class that heavily depends on elemental damage bonuses and its AoE clearing power

q_and_a.question: what are fbs?
q_and_a.answer: Use `>>fblist` to see all fatebounds and `>>fb` for specific fatebounds
